content.detailedDescription: I was fishing in stone canyon in southeast owasso, ok. these photos were taken back to back so i am curious to what was in background on the first picture.
content.summary: Unusual object flying through the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was standing facing our lake to the north....The red moon was in the south sky not visible from where i was standing. i was smoking a cigarette when i saw a reflection on the melting ice on the lake. i looked up and immediatly grabbed my cell phone and snapped over 30 pictures of which only caught 5 images since they kept moving. it made my heart skip a beat, the last picture especially was when the two lights became one and shot straight up in the sky and gone.
content.summary: Two rectangle like lights darting back and forth then straight up and gone

content.detailedDescription: It was 1/14/14 approximately around 8:30 am.  my husband and i where sitting on the patio in the backyard drinking coffee.  the sky was clear blue and sunny.  there where 3 jets flying above in different directions and at different altitudes.  it's common for us to view jets as we live not far from the las vegas airport.  as i was looking in the sky towards the west i noticed something really odd.  it was a barrel shaped possibly white metal looking object with bright silver light pulsating around it's perimeter, looking as if it was moving at an incredible fast speed.  the object did not move as a regular jet or plane would move in a horizontal position.  instead it moved in the barrel shape with the narrow part of the barrel at the top facing the sky and the narrow bottom of the barrel facing the earth. when i noticed all the reflective light i turned around to look at the sun which was directly behind me and than looked back at the object to see if perhaps the sun was making it look that way.  what i saw "clearly" was the outline shape of a barrel, meaning the top and bottom of the shape where more narrow and the mid-section was wider.  i clearly saw very bright silver-like bright light pulsating all around the perimeter of the object. i sat there for 3-5 minutes observing it to get a clear picture of what i saw committing it to memory.  as it headed in a sw position i watched it until it disappeared into a pinpoint.  it did not look like any aircraft i had ever seen, both in shape and movement.
content.summary: White metallic barrel shaped object with silver pulsating light around perimeter seen w to sw sky moving at incredible speed and disappearing into a pinpoint.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out my front door to get my phone charger. i always look up at the sky to observe the stars at night when possible, as i did i noticed a red glowing orb it would dim then brighten. i watched it hover as it got closer. i tried to identify it, i looked for other lights and waited for a blue light to blink like a helicopter would, but i did not see that. when i noticed it was something i have never seen. i ran inside to gather my wife and my son and brother in-law. i jokingly ran inside and said "hey guys come out here you got to see this it's a ufo" my wife ignored me, but my brother in-law and my son came out in a hurry. we all watched it pulsate slowly as it continued its path after a few moments the orb dimmed out to a black sphere and sat in place. it was very dark and hard to track but continued to move along it's path slowly after that it was hard to see and we lost interest and went back inside.
content.summary: Saw glowing red object in sky overhead it dimmed in and out then turned into black orb

content.detailedDescription:
Three lights repeatedly flying around each other (triangular, diagonal)
lights pulsated in different colors
watched it around 30 minutes
asked two men if there is anything today in that area; they said 'no', watched the lights for some minutes and went on the other way
then tried to get to the area. but there was no road leading there only the beginning of a forest behind crossed rails i couldnt pass
when i got back to the first spot they were gone
content.summary: Three lights flying triangulary around themselves from double treesize down behind the trees repeatedly

content.detailedDescription: It was 10:00 approximately and i was walking to our communal mailbox.Our street is a dead- end with the box down by the end. as i was walking to the box  my gaze was at the sky because it was the night of the "bloodmoon". the eclipse didn't look like it had quite begun yet. i looked to the south where the mailbox was in relation to me an saw a very bright blue and red object that really caught my attention. it was a circular seeming like a marble held at arms length. the lights were not strobeing like a plane and it moved very smoothly. seemed very fast as well. as i watched the object stopped,hovered,turned a kind of burning deep red and circled in the air,hesitated a moment headed west,reversed,hovered in same spot,turned electric blue,circled the opposite direction. then it hovered a moment turned bright white and dropped straight down. not like falling though,very quickly dropped. at that time it was out of my sight and i did not see it again.I probably stood there with my mouth hanging open longer than the sighting took. i guess i thought it was a u.F.O. right away,in the sense that i knew it was not a helicopter or light plane. i felt kind of agitated and kept going out to the street to see if it could be spotted again . my wife suggested i google to see if anyone besides me saw it. she did not nor as far as i can tell did anyone else.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A glowing blue and red object moving very smoothly, turned dark red and circled,started west,reversed turned electric blue.Circled opposite direction. turned pure white and dropped straight down.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my trailor on a vacation to hillsdale cherry lane nudist resort,
i was stargazing because its such a nice night there
a star or planet of some sort 
it hovered above me for at least 30 mins before taking abord me and my dog lucy and ripped my poor dog to shreds when we was trying to defend me because he was always so protective and i just felt so weird it was so bright and silent, no sound at all and i couldnt see because the beaming lights were so bright and i awoken in a tube a great long clear tube although i couldnt see anything i felt a precense of observation and i was so cold, colder then any feeling i have ever had before and i could feel them observing everything i did before i fell into a weird coma like sleep and awoken in my trailer on the floor.
content.summary: Scary

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the ymca where i dropped of my daughter for day care.  i drove off on schoolhouse lane towards work.  at the intersection of wambold and schoolhouse lane i was stopped at the light when i noticed the event.

i'm an avid aviation person and have been to many air shows throughout my life.  i know what aircraft trails normally look like.  i'm always scanning the skies looking at planes.  it's because of this habit that i notice this trial.

i was looking in the ne while stopped at a light and noticed that it looked like a plane trail that made 90 degree turn.  it caught my attention as being very odd.  so i have my iphone on me mounted in my car so i used my iphone 5 camera to snap a picture (that i've attached).  the cloud trail stayed there while i drove to work and din't move at all.

when i got to work i downloaded the picture to my computer and blew it up a bit.  from my best analysis i can see trails for two different aircrafts.  one seems normal, the second seems odd.  it goes from narrow to wide, then narrow again.  it then makes a 7 shape in the sky (which is what caught my attention).  it's weird on many levels.  wind doesn't blow trails this way or as specific.  so i'm stumped.

having been to many air shows, and actually having a flight simulator built in my house, there is no known aircraft type that i'm aware of that can make turns like that.
content.summary: Saw cloud trail that goes from narrow to wide and makes 90 degree turns

content.detailedDescription:
My family was observing the blood moon lunar eclipse at the complete eclipsed phase, my wife noticed the object first. it was an intense orange light. appeared to be on fire. the object was traveling south to north turned west the light extinguished. you could see the disc shape of the object with details the bottom was not smooth or uniform in color from the lights of the city reflecting off the bottom on the object. it hovered momentarily and continued nw before disappearing in the horizon.

minuets later we saw the same object again same from same location. it turned more west in its flight path hovered momentarily took a more west bound direction appeared to descend as it traveled west. the fiery light extinguish the same as it turned west. can't believe it wasn't on the news. we couldn't have been the only one's to see this. never seen anything like this in the skies over my house.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: First observed object from south appeared to be on fire. before changing direction

content.detailedDescription:
On the 14th april at around 11.25pm, i noticed a strange light in the sky. i live in a tower block so have a good view of the mersey estuary in iverpool, england. at first i thought it may be a balloon with lights on it but after looking through binoculars i saw it was unlike anything i have ever seen in the sky. 

the object seemed to have different panels on it with each changing colour from orange, yellow to amber. the onject stood stationary then began to move slowly. after a couple of minutes i got a camera to try and record the event, sadly the photo was taken just as the object few off suddenly. the object was witnessed by someone with me. 

after first spotting the object i had about 5 mins viewing before it flew off quite suddenly and vanished from view in a second or two. planes do fly over my home area (8 miles from liverpool john lennon airport) but this was not a plane and certainly not a balloon as the wind would have needed to have been hurricane force to move a balloon so fast. 

the object had multi-coloured lights glowing on the surface and i was convinced it was not any aircraft,baloon and certainly not another 'chinese lantern' which is pretty common and easy to detect. this object seemed quite big, possibly over 100 foot in circumferance. 

i was amazed to see it sit almost stationary, then begin to move very slowly. it was hovering somewhere over the wirral which is over the other side of the river mersey. it flew off towards the direction of wales, which you can see from my flat which takes in the view of liverpool, wales, the river mersey and eastuary. 

i was sober at the time as was my witness. i cannot say that this was alien craft but it seemed to show all the signs of being something that i have no reference point for. i have never seen anything like it and was quite exited as i viewed it.

i drew a small picture of what i saw, if it helps i can submit this and a photo of the area i spotted the craft. i have also looked online to see if anyone else spotted this strange object. it was not a star, certainly not a firework and due to the way the object floated stationary then flew off faster than planes in the vicinity, i wonder was it picked up by radar from the nearby airport. i am sure others spotted the object and would like to know myself just what it was. 

i hope this report helps. this is an honest testimony of what i saw.

note: the photo is taken on a camera which has not had the time or date set on it. i made a careful note of the time the incident occured so ignore the date stamp on the photo which only shows the area were the object was, not the objecft itself (it was too fast!)

thanks for reading.
content.summary: Strange multicoloured orb with changing colours that stood stationary in sky then flew at very fast speed away.

content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking a cigarette waiting to see the blood moon when it just appeared a star like object bouncing then disappeared and reappeared bouncing disappearing and reappearing all over ascended and disappeared in min. shocked and amazed!
content.summary: Star like bouncing appeared disappeared ascented and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking a cigarette waiting to see the blood moon when it just appeared a star like object bouncing then disappeared and reappeared bouncing disappearing and reappearing all over ascended and disappeared in min. shocked and amazed!
content.summary: Star like bouncing appeared disappeared ascented and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside of my university looking at the night sky. i was out observing the lunar eclipse. i was about to walk back inside when i looked up one last time and looked to my right in the sky. i assumed at first it was a helicopter or plane but i've never seen one like this. it rapidly descended and was bright red. it then hovered for a few seconds as i stared right at it. after which, it sped to, what i assume, is impossible speeds for modern day aircrafts. it was a small yet noticeable red orb of light. it disappeared, vanished from sight within
seconds from an absolute stop it seemed. it appeared to be following a parabolic path from it's descent, halt and rapid ascension and movement sw. i was stunned. i continued to look around to see if there was any medical helicopters flying, planes, whatever. but it was so silent and dead in the sky. i am a supporter of mufon so i figured i should report this. this would be my first sighting and i am a believer, always have been. so i was left staggered and quite exhilarated from the event. that's why i stayed out there another hour checking for possible bias or another sighting.
content.summary: Coming in from west descending then rapid path change to southwest followed by disappearance.

content.detailedDescription: I was working outside and looked up to see a passing plane on its way to lockheed martin in lancaster, ca. this is a usual sighting as planes frequently pass overhead due to the bases. for some reason i wanted to take a photo of the plane passing and i did so. it was not until i went back and checked the photo i snapped with my phone, that i could clearly see a large bright glowing orb which appeared to be above the passing plane. the sun can be seen in the bottom middle section of the photo with the plane to the top of the photo and the ufo right above it almost like it was passing horizontal to the plane. i did not see this object with my eyes when focusing on the plane for the photo. i did not have a chance to search for it in the sky after since i unfortunately waited to check the photo after work at home. regardless i am excited and amazed at this event and hope to see more sightings soon.
content.summary: After taking a picture of a passing plane on way to near base, observed an orb in photo above the plane.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking up at the lunar eclipse. then i noticed a shadow in the sky above my head that looked like a large bird at first glance. as i focused on it, the the shape became very visible. it had 5 lights on the front side. it wasn't there for long and the lights were very dim. it seemed more like reflections of light, but as it changed angles from me they didn't change or move. i could cleared see the outline of the object as it disappeared due to the lights of the city. it was only visible to me for like 9 seconds. it was moving very fast. from the shape and speed it was moving my first though it was a bird for that reason. it did not appear to be very far from me. then i could see there was no flapping, and the lights very faintly.
content.summary: I was looking up at the lunar eclispe. then i noticed a shadow in the sky above my head that looked like a large bird at first glance. as i focused on it, the the shape bacame very visible. it had 5 lights on the front side.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i went outside in the back yard to observe the blood moon eclipse which was not ready for viewing so my daughter went into the house.  i then i noticed a bright blue light moving around like a butterfly, i thought to myself helicopters don't move like that.  i called for my daughter a 13 year old skeptic to come see it and she saw the same thing.  a bright blue object fluttering around up and down back and forth then up behind the clouds blinking rapidly then a slow blink.  i ran to get my fianc�� but he didn't want to come and see, he'd rather not know what's out there.  i went back into the backyard and could still see the object faintly blinking behind the clouds.  it was like a blink pause 1,2,3,4,5...Blink and continued until it disappeared completely.  we tried to take a pic with our phone but nothing showed up.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright blue object fluttering around like a butterfly then ascending, stationary then take off, then stationary blinking behind clouds

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family were watching television when my aunt spotted what appeared to be a series of orange colored orbs floating up the road  it almost seemed towards the nearby mountains which when entering a nearby valley located directly in front of the nearby mountains were suddenly joined by a series  of  bright reddish colored lights that when coming into same area as the orange colored orbs would cause the orange orbs to blink out only to reappear and cause the reddish lights that were pursuing them to break off there pursuit as if the two groups were engaged in some kind of dog fight like skirmish the best way i can describe it is that it looked like something you would see on the television or in the movies it was truly beyond belife
content.summary: Orange and red  colored orbs

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i was looking at the stars in the sky when i saw a star move 
and i asked my brother if stars could move and said only if the were falling 
at the time we were looking though a set of binoculars so he took them from me to see . and at that time the u.F.O dropped for the sky right over our are heads tree top high my brother told me to run in side and get my father so i did when we came out the u.F.O moved east at a slow moving pace about a half a block the it stop over a play ground still tree top high and that time we were looking at it a police officer came out of his house and ask what we were looking at and we pointed up to the sky right next to his house . then he went in side a to get his camera and he took a picture of it . then a plane came very loudly tree top high and the u.F.O shot straight up very fast 
and disappeared .
content.summary: Bright light hovering over holland mich when i was 8 or ten years old

content.detailedDescription: I was riding home on school bus. i happened to look over the woods to the east, almost to the junction of west neck rd. and indian river rd. i saw an oval shaped object hovering over the woods. it was a silvery white object. it hovered a few minutes and just disappeared off towards dam neck naval base to the ne. i just happened to be looking out the window of the bus at the time. i knew it was not of this world but knew i wouldn't be beloved if i said anything. until the last few years, i had never discussed my sighting. a few years ago i read a book called weird, virginia. in it, there was a discussion of ufo sightings in the virginia beach area in 1965. tonight i saw a show on the history channel about presidential knowledge of ufos and mufon, and decided to look at the website. 49 years later, i am reporting my siting.
content.summary: Oblong object seen over wooded area

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were in our back yard. it was approximately 11 am on 4-13-14. it was a sunny day with a few clouds but not in the area of where we saw the object. my husband, looking to the north, noticed it first and it was following the flight path of a commercial jet although probably several thousand feet lower in altitude. my husband kept commenting that it was going faster than the jet was. the jet was coming from the north and going in a southerly direction. my husband kept commenting how fast it was going but i couldn't see it yet. he told me exactly where to look and when i saw it, it appeared to be a white, round object. it seemed somewhat translucent with a brighter rim--maybe a grey/white metallic look. there was no sound and it did not look like anything i have ever seen before. i was excited and shocked at the same time. it was moving very fast and it veered to the west and we could no longer see it once it went behind a tree in our yard. i took that opportunity to run into the house to grab my camera to take photos. when i came back out i couldn't see it anymore. i decided that i would still take some photos and i captured a few odd looking things. some were the same shape and color as what i had originally seen but upon looking at the photo i found a similarly shaped object but now it was darker and possibly closer to the ground. i did not see these objects while taking the photos. they only appeared after close examination of my photos. 
i took 12 photos. i have attached 5 of them. they are in the order taken.
content.summary: Round white ufo

content.detailedDescription: I went out on the front porch to look at the moon with the lunar eclipse and there were numerous silent craft traveling in front of the moon.  one was large and rest were smaller.  i thought i was seeing things and went in to get my fiance' and when he came out his jaw dropped.  i do not know how anyone could miss it - some times they stopped - they did not move in unison - the way they moved they were under separate control.  the one large one gave the sight effect that is was huge and much bigger than the moon - below and to the lower right of the moon.  i cannot even guestimate the size of any of the craft overall because it is dark outside.  there were no lights, no noise - they just glided.  the whole event lasted over 17-minutes! wow!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: One large craft and numerous smaller craft traveling out toward the atlantic ocean

content.detailedDescription: at approximately 10:00 pm i observed the almost full moon through a slightly overcast sky. i set my camera and tripod up to begin filming the moon for roughly 30 minutes. i occasionally repositioned the camera due to the movement of the moon. after filming was complete, i loaded it to my computer and began watching the film through my 47 inch hd t.V. i adjusted the brightness and contrast to bring out the most detail i could get. when doing so i noticed bright objects circling around the back side of the moon, at about the 1:00-3:00 positions. when the objects crossed back in front of the moon, shadows were seen for a short time until the objects disappeared completely. i've counted ten objects so far on the film. my first impression of these objects were that they were meteors, but the frequency and behavior of the objects leads me to believe that they are vehicles. i am using a sony digicam 1080p hd camera, and i watch the film on a 47 inch 1080p television. i am currently awaiting contact from my astronomy professor to further analyze the film before releasing it for public viewing.
content.summary: Objects were witnessed orbiting the moon.

content.detailedDescription: We had just packed the car and we're leaving when we saw 1 orange glowing object out over the water. we stopped and i got out of the car and took a cellphone pic . i went to the car to get my camera and when i turned around, there were 2. as i took pictures 3and 4 appeared out of nowhere. they looked like they were morphing or some kind of action was taking place. then, they dimmed and came back on but not as bright and more uniform in color and shape. it was at this time that my camera stopped working. this kind of scared me, so i got back in the car and left. during this time, there was one other car that had pulled over and they were taking pics from inside their car. later i saw. the green sphere in a cellphone picture that i had taken about 10 -15 minutes before i saw the fireballs.
content.summary: I was leaving the beach when i spotted one glowing object out over the water. i pulled over and got out of the car and took pictures as 4 orange fireballs appeared from nowhere 1 by 1. later i found the glowing green sphere in a picture i had taken earlie

content.detailedDescription: My family (ten members in total including myself) and i were leaving my aunt's house which stood atop a small hill in the countryside, after a late night dinner and get together. when going out to get our cars this enormous sphere appeared like when you turn a light on. it was very close to us at a height of about 100 ft more or less. it just stood in the air and was kind of pulsating. it had a whitish light. sudenly another sphere emerged from the big one and stood by its side. no doors or anything were seen. it just emerged. i guess 10 minutes passed. we were all silent, astonished, in awe. really, i didn't notice what the rest of my family was doing. afterwards, the second sphere merged into the huge one and dissapeared just like when a light goes out. we didn't even talked about the incident for days. it changed my life. i have become obsessed with everything that has to do with ufos, abductions and related issues. i guess that whatever this was, it was making a statement for us to be believers because prior to the sighting we had been talking about ufos.All i can tell is that i am the only member of my family that still has that night's experience deep within my soul. it changed me forever.
content.summary: It just 'appeared" and was a huge sphere very close to all ten witnesses. another sphere emerged from the big one and then merged. it then dissapeared in an instant.

content.detailedDescription:
I always looking to the sky, at this time i was on my patio when i see the object  and i try to do what people say and was so quick. first i take my binoculars to see the object it was like changing the colors that i mention blue,red,pink not shape  blurred and to have a  prove or something i bring my camera and when i try to focus the ufo the lenses where like i was summing back and fowar so i put the tripoid and drop my camera and i can't take it i was frustrated  the ufo stay for about ten minutes and  gone.The problem it's when you try to talk with somebody about it the only thing you get it's ignoring you or loughs about you.
and another  two different times i saw a 3 red lights like a triangle moving in circle no matter what turn make not loose the shape like tridimentional not noise moving to slow and high maybe when small planes pass. so i'm seen them must the times at nigth with my binoculars and i keep by my self not telling to anybody. if this help thank you. i'm sorry that i can prove physical evidence my camera it's broke and i don't have nigth vision lenses.
content.summary: Stationary not moving look like star and it's was early for that

content.detailedDescription: Me and my best friend (to this day) were enjoying a few beers (we were pilfering them from my parents so we only had a few and were not drunk) over a bonfire in a field about 200-300 ft behind my house. we decided to go back to my house to grab a pack of cigarettes i forgot. we stood up when all of a sudden as if appearing from nowhere a bright fluorescent red disc (between 15-30ft in diameter approx) with 3 small strips of black which created 3 triangles of red (but it was clearly one object). the craft was directly over head from us just above the treeline. i want to say no more than 30 ft probably lower though. the craft was silent. i want to say that i probably said something like "what the f***!" at first but me and my friend stood in silence for what was probably around five minutes. the object just hovered there, unmoving. then just as the craft had appeared it disapeared. my friend says he remembered the thing shooting off but i remember it seemed as though it disappeared as if it opened up a portal where it was hovering and disappeared into it. after it was gone we were both mentally and physically shaken. we ran back to my house pondered what we had seen. after that night we did not talk about it until the summer of 2013. the subject came up and as a way to prove to myself that i had seen a ufo i asked my friend what color the craft was. he said it was without a doubt a bright red. i got goosebumps when he said that. this confirmed my suspicions that had lingered since that night. i knew without a doubt we saw a ufo. since then ive become increasingly interested in researching ufo phenomenon however i have shared this expierience with probably 3 people because it is such an unbelievable tale to most but my friend and i know without a doubt what we saw.
content.summary: My friend and i were having a bonfire in my backyard. suddenly a florescent red disc shaped object appeared just above the trees, hovered for several minutes then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out the window,saw red object in the sky ,went outside to look.This object was not moving then went from right to left slow for around 2mins then disappeared .Then a plane came after that.It was a very clear night.....
content.summary: Pulse red light

content.detailedDescription: Hi just to say i was watching a movie on turnner classic movies and was watching a movie with katherin heperin blck and white movie 1944 on a japan war or something and a scene where planes come over the city they were in when the plane were ready to bom them you could see a object flying away opposite of the planes that was weared since roswell thing was couple of years later.
content.summary: Like a commet

content.detailedDescription: Around mid august of 2005 i was flying back from atlanta airport returning to st.Louis after visiting a friend.  about 10-15 minutes into the flight i looked out to my right out the window (i had a window seat) and i saw what appeared to be the top of a castle protruding through the clouds.   i thought wow that is a tall mountain for us to be seeing it so close from the air.  it looked like a rock ���castleted��� wall that was the edge of a parking lot for an observatory that was paved with small brown rocks.  i saw no cars but it was so convincing i never have dreamed it wasn���t a real parking lot to some mountain top observation point.  i watched this object for 3-4 minutes as we were flying past it.  it wasn���t until later i realized just how big something like that would have had to be to stay in view for nearly five minutes.  the perspective was not on top of it more like maybe 1,000 ��� above it and moving past it like i was at a 45 degreee angle to the walls of this castle.  while i was watching it i turned around in the plane to try and see if anyone else was looking out the window and seeing the same thing.   most people were sleeping and had their windows shut, but one college age girl was also watching it out the window and i said ���do you see that?��� and she replied ���yeah������ kind of like she was also seeing it but thinking something was not quite right.  the thing that makes me really mad is that i had a 3 d camera with me and didn���t use it.  the reason was that it just looked like the top of a national park and completely normal other than the fact that is was staying in view for 3-4 minutes and we were at 25,000+ feet in the air.   so as i was getting off the plane i stopped asked the pilot ���what mountain that was that was out the right side right after we took off?���  he replied ���there���s no mountain up there where we were at and nothing around where we flew that was of any real height���. then he proceeded to chuckle a little at me as i walked off the plane.  now i was really sure that this was really something!  i felt like such a fool for not taking a picture but like i said, i didn���t look abnormal just out of place and huge.  when i got down to baggage claim in st.Louis i saw the college girl explaining what she saw to her mother in a very excited manner.  and now i am kicking myself for not getting her contact info to this day.  so 9 yrs later i had to get this out and documented.  i���ve never heard of any ufo like this before���
content.summary: Castellated stone wall petruding with gravel parking lot on top through clouds from plane huge! saw for 8 mins
Incomplete
